entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2025-03-26
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Test failure "microsoft.com sub-string not found" in Components.E2ETests.ServerRenderingTests.RedirectionTest.RedirectStreamingEnhancedGetToExternal #61175
  • Server-side Blazor Scoped injection is very unhelpful #61174
  • Perf regression: json #61172
  • Perf improvement: kestrel-hostheader-mismatch #61171
  • WebApplicationFactory<TEntryPoint> will not allow Middleware to be added via the ConfigureWebHost() method and maintain the existing functionality from the TEntryPoint. #61170
  • Dot Net 8+ NotFound behavior #61169
  • Make it possible to turn of OpenID Connect configuration retrieval, or enable removal of an added authentication handler #61168
  • SignalR.Client: Failed sending message, trying.. #61164
  • Perf regression: fortunes #61163

Closed

  • [Blazor] Blazor Web App with multiple secure API not working with OIDC #60868
  • Output caching not working on child action #57116
  • ASP.NET Core OpenAPI generator incorrectly duplicates schemas and creates invalid $ref for simple structure #60164
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper, json_middleware #61149

PullRequests

Created

  • Do not use Wix targets to sign intermediates #61173
    area-infrastructure
  • [Blazor] Generate Link headers based on StaticWebAssets manifest properties #61166
    area-blazor, 10.0-preview4

Merged

  • Update Chrome download link and disable TerminalLogger for Helix tests #61157
    area-infrastructure, 10.0-preview4

Updated

  • Update .NET SDK to 10.0.100-preview.4.25174.4 #61134
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:
  • Harden handling for generic type arguments in source generator #61145
    area-mvc
  • Add `NotFoundPage` to `Router` #60970
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-routing, .NET 10 Planning
  • [Blazor] Use WriteImportMapToHtml=true in blazorwasm template #61036
    area-blazor, feature-blazor-wasm, 10.0-preview4
  • Add a new UseKestel API to the WebApplicationFactory #60635
    area-mvc
